alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Cannon; Coffee; De Kalb; Grundy; Rutherford; Van Buren; Warren; White (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 11:22AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern De Kalb, southeastern Rutherford, northwestern Van Buren, Warren, Coffee, northeastern Bedford, northwestern Grundy, southwestern White and Cannon Counties through NOON CDT... At 1121 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Smithville to 7 miles southwest of Woodbury to near Shelbyville. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shelbyville, McMinnville, Manchester, Smithville, Woodbury, Tullahoma, Morrison, Wartrace, Doyle, Bell Buckle, Dowelltown, Liberty, Centertown, Normandy, Viola, Rock Island State Park, Raus, Beechgrove, Fosterville and Bradyville. Bonnaroo will also be impacted. This includes Interstate 24 between mile markers 87 and 119. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for Middle Tennessee.

area.areaDesc: Bedford; Cannon; Coffee; De Kalb; Grundy; Rutherford; Van Buren; Warren; White
